html.p: This dashboard shows user logons. Click a row to get session details including individual process resource utilization.

search.query: `xd_index` sourcetype=xenapp:*:session FarmName="$FarmName$" BrowserName="$BrowserName$*" UserName="$UserName$" ServerName="$server$" | stats latest(UserName) AS UserName latest(ClientIPV4) AS ClientIPV4 latest(ClientVersion) AS ClientVersion latest(CurrentTime) AS CurrentTime latest(DeviceType) AS DeviceType values(BrowserName) AS BrowserName BY LogOnTime ServerName SessionId | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %Z" mktime(CurrentTime) mktime(LogOnTime) | eval SessionDuration = tostring(CurrentTime - LogOnTime, "duration") | eval "Log on Time" = strftime(LogOnTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | table UserName "Log on Time" ServerName SessionId SessionDuration BrowserName ClientIPV4 DeviceType ClientVersion LogOnTime CurrentTime | rename UserName AS "User Name" ServerName AS "Server Name" SessionId AS "Session ID" BrowserName AS "Application" ClientIPV4 AS "IP Address" DeviceType AS "Device Type" ClientVersion AS "Client Version"
